1.10.2.1.1.1.10:
New Stuff: Added [Ender Gateway] structure. Added [Phasic Block] and [Boundary Block]
Some buildings can now be generated in mod-created dimensions.
1.10.2.1.1.1.11: New Stuff: Added [Aqua Base] structure. Added Desert and Snowy style starting houses.
1.10.2.1.1.1.12: Fixes: Instant Bridge not showing preview. New Stuff: Added new language files. Starter Hosue can now be in the nether.
1.10.2.1.1.1.13: New Stuff: Added Grassy Plain structure.
1.10.2.1.1.1.14: New Stuff: Added Magic Temple structure. Fixes: Made structure generation faster, fixed villager houses.
1.10.2.1.1.1.15: New Stuff: Added Greenhouse, various new stairs/slabs, added starting house crafting.
1.10.2.1.1.1.16: Fixes: A player can generate 2 structures at same time now.

1.11.2.1.2.0.5:
New Stuff: Added [Ender Gateway] structure. Added [Phasic Block] and [Boundary Block]
Some buildings can now be generated in mod-created dimensions.
1.11.2.1.2.0.6: New Stuff: Added [Aqua Base] structure. Added Desert and Snowy style starting houses.
1.11.2.1.2.0.7: Fixes: Instant Bridge not showing preview. New Stuff: Added new language files. Structures with water can now be in the Nether/End.
1.11.2.1.2.0.8: New Stuff: Added Grassy Plain structure.
1.11.2.1.2.0.9: New Stuff: Added Magic Temple structure. Fixes: Made structure generation faster, fixed villager houses.
1.11.2.1.2.0.10: New Stuff: Added Greenhouse, various new stairs/slabs, added starting house crafting.
1.11.2.1.2.0.11: Fixes: A player can generate 2 structures at same time now.
1.11.2.1.2.0.12: Adds moderate houses. Adds compressed blocks to Ore Dictionary.
1.11.2.1.2.0.13: Updates Language files, fixes carpet generation, fixes green house.
1.11.2.1.2.0.14: Added options to Moderate House. Fixed issue with structures replacing bedrock
1.11.2.1.2.0.15: Added option to not include chest in mineshaft. Fixed issue with pulling items from creative menu on server
1.11.2.1.2.0.17: Added Bulldozer, fixed phasic block and preview, changed grassy plains cleared area
1.11.2.1.2.0.18: Added Welcome Center, added enchanting table to Monster Masher
1.11.2.1.2.0.19: Enhanced the Instant Bridge to have variable length, height and materials.

1.12.1.3.0.0: Initial release containing latest updates from 1.2.0.10.
1.12.1.3.0.1: Fixes: A player can generate 2 structures at same time now.
1.12.1.3.0.2: Adds moderate houses. Adds compressed blocks to Ore Dictionary
1.12.1.3.0.4: Updates Language files. Fixes issues with carpet generation in Acacia house.
1.12.1.3.0.5: Fixes the green house to have more light for crops.
1.12.1.3.0.6: Fixes grassy plains crafting. Fixes crafting of certain items when playing on a server
1.12.1.3.0.7: Fixed an issue where the AquaBase wasn't craftable
1.12.1.3.0.8: Added options to Moderate House. Fixed issue with structures replacing bedrock
1.12.1.3.0.9: Added option to not include chest in mineshaft.
1.12.1.3.0.12: Fixes issues with construction and preview when the Plants mod was loaded.
1.12.1.3.0.13: Added Bulldozer, fixed phasic block and preview, changed grassy plains cleared area.
1.12.1.3.0.14: Added Welcome Center, removed direction button, added enchanting table to Monster Masher.
1.12.1.3.0.15: Fixed an issue where the Monster Masher wasn't generating.
1.12.1.3.0.16: Enhanced the Instant Bridge to have variable length, height and materials.
1.12.1.3.0.17: Added Earthen Home for the Moderate House item.
1.12.1.3.0.18: Added Jungle Tree House for the Moderate House item.
1.12.1.3.0.19: Removed ores from Acacia House basement. Fixed clear space for Earthen House.
1.12.1.3.0.20: Fixed an issue with the furnace being included in a starter house when configured not to do so.
1.12.1.3.0.21: Russian translations updated. Added structure parts which is a great way to add walls, stairs and building frames!
1.12.1.3.0.22: Added Roof and Floor to Structure Part. Added Structure part to options for starting item.
1.12.1.3.0.23: Fixes an issue with the configuration for the starting item. Also adds a Chinese (Simplified) translation file.
1.12.1.3.0.24: Adds jail structure and fixes console spam issues.
1.12.1.3.0.25: Fixes the advanced warehouse recipe to use double compressed stone.
1.12.1.3.0.26: Adds saloon structure and fixes some other structure generation issues
1.12.1.3.1.0: Added a LOT of new functionality. Checkout the CurseForge release page for more information! Warning: Breaking changes ahead!
1.12.1.3.1.1: Fixed a big issue where the mod simply would not load
1.12.1.3.1.2: Fixed issues with starting houses not generating. Fixed version number in mod info. Re-vamped all blueprint screens
1.12.1.3.1.3: Item Textures have been updated. Added configuration option for water in non-overworld dimensions. Added mod specific creative tab
1.12.1.3.1.4: Fixed an issue where the bulldozer could not be enchanted in the anvil
1.12.1.3.1.5: Fixed monster masher spawns and sign. Updated checkbox texture. Added more info to unbreakable block detection. Removed excessive recipes

1.14.1.4.0.0: Initial release containing latest updates from 1.3.0.26. Added Japanese translation file. Basic starting house was updated from procedurally generated building to a static building.
1.14.1.4.0.1: Fixes a few critical defects where the game would crash when clicking on it on the Modlist screen and fixed an issue with buildings on servers.
1.14.1.4.0.2: Fixes the basic starting house and adds a new desert style house and a new sub-aquatic style!
1.14.1.4.0.3: Fixed a server error when building the villager house or instant bridge. Also fixed the structure part gui and the Aqua Base.
1.14.1.4.0.4: Fixed issues with the Horse Stable, Structure Part and Defense Bunker. Added Turkish language file. Thanks Emirhangg!
1.14.1.4.0.5: Fixed an issue with recipe registration caused by latest forge version.
1.14.1.4.0.6: Fixed an issue caused by the forge version 28.0.92 and later.
1.14.1.4.0.7: Fixed an issue caused by the recommended version of forge. This marks the first non-beta release!
1.14.1.4.0.8: Latest forge update, fixing various rendering issues and blocks not dropping themselves.
1.14.1.4.0.9: Fixing issue with glass stairs not rendering correctly when around other glass blocks.
1.14.1.4.0.10: Adding windmill and town center. Adding Chinese(Traditional), fixing various bugs
1.14.1.4.0.11: Adding config option for bulldozer to not create drops. Allow for custom bed color!
1.14.1.4.0.12: Added lantern to list of blocks to clear properly. Fixes issues with OpenJDK
1.14.1.4.0.13: Addresses an issue where the blueprints weren't respecting the vanilla spawn protected when on dedicated servers
1.14.1.4.0.14: Fixed an issue when filling the starter house chest when repurpose was also installed
1.14.1.4.0.15: Fixed an issue when filling the moderate house chest when repurpose was also installed
1.14.1.4.0.16: Updated the configuration to provide better information for the starter house options
1.14.1.4.0.17: Fixed an issue where there starter house couldn't be built
1.14.1.4.0.18: Fixes issues with infected blocks in some buildings

1.15.1.5.0.0: Initial release for 1.15.2 containing the latest updates from 1.4.0.9.
1.15.1.5.0.1: Adding windmill and town center. Adding Chinese(Traditional), fixing various bugs
1.15.1.5.0.2: Adding config option for bulldozer to not create drops. Allow for custom bed color! Fixes issues with OpenJDK
1.15.1.5.0.3: Fixing issue with glass stairs not being transparent
1.15.1.5.0.4: Fixing mod not respecting vanilla spawn protection. Fixing issue when repurpose was also installed
1.15.1.5.0.5: Fixed an issue when filling the moderate house chest when repurpose was also installed
1.15.1.5.0.6: Updated the configuration to provide better information for the starter house options
1.15.1.5.0.7: Fixed an issue where there starter house couldn't be built
1.15.1.5.0.8: Fixed an issue the OpenJDK when using the Preview functionality
1.15.1.5.0.9: Fixed issues with infected blocks in some buildings
1.15.1.5.0.10: Fixed recipes to use Minecraft Tag system (old OreDictionary)

1.16.1.1.6.0.0: Initial release for 1.16.1 containing the latest updates from 1.5.0.9
1.16.1.1.6.0.1: Added 'Warped' and 'Mountainside' Moderate houses. Added 'Cursed Tree' Nether Gate. Also fixed issue with preview when Optifine is loaded.
1.16.1.1.6.0.2: Fixed an issue with the saloon generating as the jail instead. Fixed some structure image dimensions so they look correct.

1.16.2.1.6.1.0: Initial release for 1.16.2 containing the latest updates from 1.6.0.2

1.16.3.1.6.2.0: Initial release for 1.16.3 containing the latest updates from 1.6.1.0
1.16.3.1.6.2.1: Adds missing crafting table to Mountain Moderate House

1.16.4.1.6.4.0: Initial release for 1.16.4 containing the latest updates from 1.6.2.1
1.16.4.1.6.4.2: Fixed recipes to use Minecraft Tag system (old OreDictionary)
1.16.4.1.6.4.3: Added visual indicator of clicked block in preview and shortcut to preview to build structure

1.16.5.1.6.5.0: Initial release for 1.16.5 containing the latest updates from 1.6.4.3
1.16.5.1.6.5.1: Fixing issue with glass panes in structures. Removed wither rose from Tree Nether Gate. Fixed default config file loading
1.16.5.1.6.5.2: Fixing issue where the player could generate infinite houses without losing blueprint
1.16.5.1.6.5.3: Adding Advanced Aqua Base and Sugar Cane Farm. Aqua Base recipe updated as it was too cheap before
1.16.5.1.6.5.4: Fixed item frames in structures, made workshop blueprint. Lots of config updates, see full changelog on CurseForge
1.16.5.1.6.5.5: Fixed issue with the workshop where it would not generate the mineshaft. Added Ukrainian language file
1.16.5.1.6.5.6: Added Clear glass options to some blueprints, added Sandstone and Red Sandstone to Structure Part and Instant Bridge. Fixed more Internationalization issues
1.16.5.1.6.5.7: Re-vamped all blueprint screens, fixed some translations, added second Acacia style house to Moderate House item, added modern buildings
1.16.5.1.6.5.8: Added many new items and blocks such as Swift Blades and Dirt Walls. Also added more buildings for the Modern Buildings item
1.16.5.1.6.5.9: Fixed infinite blueprints, fixed water in nether, fixed swift blades, updated textures, added campsite starter house
1.16.5.1.6.5.10: Updated compressed chest texture, added beds to villager houses, added modern tree house, add custom creative tab
1.16.5.1.6.5.11: Agriculture update: Added tiered farms, many new and interesting types of farms. Consolidated items. See changelog on CurseForge for more details
1.16.5.1.6.5.12: Fixing campsite house error, adding lights to modern tree house, fixing some reversal recipes
1.16.5.1.6.5.13: Instant build, build generation soud, updated checkboxes, machinery tower glass color and more! See Curseforge for full changelog
1.16.5.1.6.5.14: Fixed spawners and the sign on the monster masher
1.16.5.1.6.5.15: Added configuration option for the building sound. Fixed lecterns for the town hall. Fixed various entity generation. Fixed the bulldozer for survival mode

1.17.1.1.7.1.0: Initial release for 1.17.1 containing the latest updates from 1.6.5.11
1.17.1.1.7.1.1: Fixing campsite house error, adding lights to modern tree house, fixing some reversal recipes
1.17.1.1.7.1.2: Added configuration to determine if the building sound would play. Fixed lecturns for the town hall. Fixed various entity generation issues. Fixed the bulldozer for survival mode

1.18.1.1.8.1.0: Initial release for 1.18.1 containing the latest updates from 1.7.1.2
1.18.1.1.8.1.1: Adding Quartz-Crete blocks (so many types....), adding restaurant and juice shop, adding modern moderate housee
1.18.1.1.8.1.2: Fixing item frame and painting placement. Fixing crash on dedicated server when previewing structures
1.18.1.1.8.1.3: Fixed issue with certain buildings generating with paintings
1.18.1.1.8.1.4: Added Izba starting house. Fixed Grass Wall Block connections

1.18.2.1.8.2.0: Initial release for 1.18.2 containing the latest updates from 1.8.1.4
1.18.2.1.8.2.1: Added new starter house options, added new moderate house options, added moderate barn option, fixed bug causing players to lose structure items
